{"id":1162733956,"question_id":3241,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1706771834,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1162733956/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Array Into Arrays With Max Difference","memory":"61.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[][] divideArray(int[] nums, int k) {\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        if(len%3!=0)\n            return new int[0][];\n        \n        int h = len/3;\n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        \n        int[][] res = new int[h][3];\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i+=3){\n            \n            \n            int[] row = new int[3];\n            row[0]=nums[i];\n            row[1]=nums[i+1];\n            row[2]=nums[i+2];\n            \n            if(row[2]-row[0]>k)\n                 return new int[0][];\n            \n            \n            \n            res[i/3] = row;\n        }\n        \n        \n        return res;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-array-into-arrays-with-max-difference","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
